name: The Strongest War God
author: Readcomic
content: The strongest soldier and a band of ferocious heroes -- fighting for their country, fighting for their people! Only death can stop them, and they will press on until their dying breaths!  This is a book for men! A hot-blooded story!

name: Cultivation Chat Group
author: Legend Of The Sacred Knight
kind: Action - Comedy - Martial Arts - School Life
content:
One day, Song Shuhang was suddenly added to a chat group with many seniors that suffered from chuuni disease. The people inside the group would call each other ‘Fellow Daoist’ and had all different kinds of titles: Palace Master, Cave Lord, True Monarch, Immortal Master, etc. And even the pet of the founder of the group that had run away from home was called ‘monster dog’. They would talk all day about pill refining, exploring ancient ruins, or share their experience on techniques.

However, after lurking inside the group for a while, he discovered that not all was what it seemed…

name: Versatile Mage
author: Chaos
kind: Action - Adventure - Drama - Fantasy - Martial Arts - School Life - Supernatural - Tragedy
content:
He awoke, and the world was changed. The familiar high school now teaches magic, encouraging students to become the greatest magicians they can be. Beyond the city limits, wandering magical beasts prey on humans. 
An advanced scientific world changed into one with advanced magic. Yet, what has not changed was the same teacher who looks upon him with disdain, the same students who look upon him with contempt, the same father who struggles at the bottom rung of society, and the same innocent step sister who cannot walk.

name: Smokin' Parade
author: Kataoka Jinsei
kind: Action - Drama - Horror - Mystery - Shounen - Supernatural
content:
If you liked Deadman Wonderland, you will loke this too. Synopsis will be written soon.
A really interesting MC take a look and make yourself a picture.

name: Chuan Yue Xi Yuan 3000 Hou
author: Tian Ping
content: This story is about a girl from year 2011 that time travelled to year 3011. In year 3011, machines with conscience have taken over some of the humans and some humans with special powers have appeared. All of them want world domination but the humans want their freedom. She is caught between this conflict and struggles to be with the one she loves.

name: Deception
author: Xiao Ming
content: A nuclear crisis dubbed as "Hellfire Blaze", that nearly pushed mankind to the brink of extinction. A group of elites' research gave results to a tree sapling that can absorb radiation, under the protection of the "shade", mankind started to revive civilization, giving birth to a cunning yet interesting New World of Murim.

name: Slayerdramon Ant
author: TaXue Comic
content: A high school student Zheng Lang reincarnated into an ant after the death. The world he lives now is another world, which is under the control of monsters. One day, he ran into some people who accidently intrude this world and they became friends later. A new and exciting journey is waiting for them…

name: Doryoku Shisugita Sekai Saikyou No Butouka Wa, Mahou Sekai Wo Yoyuu De Ikinuku.
author: Wankosoba
content: Updating

name: Supreme Demon
author: Leyou yinghua
content: Supreme Demon summary is updating. Come visit MangaNelo.com sometime to read the latest chapter of Supreme Demon. If you have any question about this manga, Please don't hesitate to contact us or translate team. Hope you enjoy it.

name: Martial Arts Reigns
author: Pojie
content: Ye Ming, the rising star of Family Ye is regarded as a genius among his peer cultivators. But he was schemed by his jealous cousin and the latter cut his meridians, crippled his abilities and hamstrung him ruthlessly. But Ye Ming never gives up because he’d sacrifice everything for take revenge for his deceased parents who were murdered by Family Huang. But he doesn’t know that he is considered a pain in the neck to Family Ye and a big conspiracy is looming out of the darkness…

name: Fate Controlling
author: JMCOMIC
content: The intertwined three spaces, the dangerous school campus, the blood-shed battlefields. From now on, from then on, even if you revived in this world, what could you change? What would you want to change? Countless monsters in the dark street when night falls and many lives have been devoured by inhuman creatures. How will he retrieve the situation and reverse everything to the beginning?

name: Isekai Yururi Kikou - Raising Children While Being An Adventure
author: MINAZUKI Shizuru
kind: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Fantasy - Shounen - Slice of Life - Supernatural
content: A god was suddenly prostrating in front of Kayano Takumi. He was apparently killed by mistake. Moreover, he can’t be reborn again. However, he is able to live in a different world? Then, let’s do that, please. The god made a mistake again and transferred me into a dangerous forest. Seriously, what’s going on? Besides, there are children here. I can’t leave them here, I will take care of them.

name: Xink3r
author: Kwon Chu
content:
XINK3R manga summary: 
A parkour boy becoming a hero in the hacker's world! Original Korean Webcomic

name: The Demon King Who Lost His Job
author: Ye Wu
content: The Demon King Who Lost His Job summary is updating. Come visit MangaNelo.com sometime to read the latest chapter of The Demon King Who Lost His Job. If you have any question about this manga, Please don't hesitate to contact us or translate team. Hope you enjoy it.

name: Cheating Men Must Die
author: The king (时代漫王)
content: One moment oppressing scum yields a moment of satisfaction. Continuously oppressing scum yields continuous satisfaction. Our female main lead, Su Lüxia is bound to the Female Lead Counterattack System and transmigrates to several small worlds. Using elaborate means, she beats up countless cheating bastards and bitches. Su Lüxia: "Only a cheating bastard's tears of remorse, and the pained moans of a bitch unable to get what she wants bring me solace." System: "Has my host tapped into her humanity today? Nope." -- Coming Soon ™SM

name: Toukyou卍revengers
author: WAKUI Ken
content: Takemichi is a 26-year-old unemployed virgin who learns that the girl he dated in middle school—the only girl he ever dated—has died. Then, after an accident he finds himself in a time leap back to his middle school years. He vows to change the future and save the girl, and to do that he aims to rise to the top of the Kantou regions most brutal delinquent gang.

name: Edens Zero
author: MASHIMA Hiro
kind: Action - Adventure - Fantasy - Martial Arts - Shounen
content: Updating

name: Ponkotsu-chan Kenshouchuu
author: Tsubasa Fukuchi
kind: Action - Comedy - Romance - School Life - Shounen - Slice of Life
content: Yumesaki-san has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an anonymous person called God. But for what purpose?

name: Switch Witch
author: Sayaka Mogi
kind: Action - Comedy - Drama - Horror - Josei - Mystery - Psychological - Seinen - Supernatural
content: It centers on a girl named Wakaba Himekawa, who is aware that she is growing up slower than other people, but otherwise lives a peaceful life. On the same day that she finally gets her first period, her childhood friend Takaya confesses that he loves her. While Wakaba had never felt that way for her friend before, she is still happy, if confused. As she is about to answer Takaya's confession, an alarm suddenly sounds, and a broadcast begins that will change her everyday life.

name: Apotheosis
author: Ranzai studio
content:
Apotheosis - elevation to the status of a god.
Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.

name: My Grimreaper bodyguard
author: Jksmanga
kind: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Fantasy - Isekai - Magical - Martial Arts - School Life - Supernatural - Webtoon
content: Death decides to give his youngest son his first-ever task, but instead of taking a life, he has to protect one instead. The problem is kai has never been to the human world and doesn't know how to act like one either. This means someone's got a Grimreaper as a bodyguard.

name: Chromosome 47
author: TaXue Comic
content: When he woke up, the whole world changed. Now, it is the end of the world, and the former rich, star, and high officials were all returned to be nobody. A canned meat can be exchanged for a beautiful female star who once hit the country. This is a world talking by fist…

name: Teleported into legendary world
author: Dazhou
kind: Action - Drama - Fantasy - Martial Arts - Supernatural - Webtoon
content: When she dies, she travels into liaozhai world (A famous Chinese legendary book) by accident. Bad guys are unexpectedly handsome and cool while good guys are weak and half-witted! Couples were supposed to be together don't know each other while friends were expected to support each other become enemies! What happened? Everything is in a mess! Can our heroine retrieve the situation and win her own love?

name: I'm a Middle-Aged Man Who Got My Adventurer License Revoked, but I'm Enjoying a Carefree Lifestyle B
author: Manimani ononata
content: Douglas was once known as a legendary strong magician. But now as he starts getting old, his body fades and becomes tattered. In addition, he was forced to leave the heroes party, and eventually was stripped of his adventurer's license. In this way, Douglas, who was determined to travel alone encounters a cursed girl named Ravi while wandering, and the journey of two people begins.

name: I Became a Legend a Decade Later After Telling My Comrades to Leave Everything to Me and Retreat Fir
author: Ezo gingitsune
content: The Hero’s party was attacked by a large group of powerful devils. The party will no doubt be annihilated if this were to go on. One member of the party, the strongest mage, Rakku decided to stop the enemies in their tracks.

name: Master of Gu
author: BingYi Manhua
content:
A story of a villain, Fang Yuan who was reborn 500 years into the past with the ChunQiu Cicada he painstakingly refined. With his profound wisdom, battle and life experiences, he seeks to overcome his foes with skill and wit! Ruthless and amoral, he has no need to hold back as he pursues his ultimate goals. In a world of cruelty where one cultivates using Gu - magical creatures of the world - Fang Yuan must rise up above all with his own power.
--------------------------------
Gu is a legendary venomous insect, often used in black magic practices. It can take on the form of several insects, usually snakes, crickets, worms etc.

name: Energy Hunters
author: Dazhou
content: Gu Xinghe is a high school student with few words. After a mysterious bloody red rain, he suddenly found he became the target of a group of monstrous creatures, "the Death Disciples." Whatsmore, his beloved friend Lu Yang fell into a coma on his birthday from the monsters' attack, while Xinghe was saved by a girl with tremendous power. To save his friend, Xinghe joined the "Energy Hunters" academy that the girl attends, and start training to fight the "Death Disciples" and other dark powers.

name: Koko wa Ore ni Makasete Saki ni Ike to Itte kara 10 Nen ga Tattara Densetsu ni Natteita
author: Action
content:
The Hero’s party was attacked by a large group of powerful devils. The party will no doubt be annihilated if this were to go on. 
One member of the party, the strongest mage, Rakku, decided to stop the enemies in their tracks.

name: Foul Smell
author: 디긋
content: Starting from a few days ago, a rotten smell started to come from a lower floor apartment. A few days later my friend disappeared. The girl who lives in that apartment as well. Who's next....? This is the story of those that disappeared and those seeking to find them!

name: Incognito Detective
author: Jmcomic
kind: Action - Adventure - Drama - Historical - Mystery - Romance
content: Famous female detective Huang Zixian, became a wanted murderer who poisoned the whole family overnight. She fled from her hometown to the capital with her grievance, and she encountered Li Shubai, the Duke of Kui, on the way. Then she dressed as an incognito eunuch with the help of Shubai at the royal palace. They were involved into many mysteries and together deal with the intermittent clues behind the strangeness. At the end of all the bizarre suspense, the truth was enough to topple the whole dynasty.

name: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time
author: Sa Doyeon
content: Yeon-woo had a twin brother who disappeared five years ago. One day, a pocket watch left by his brother returned to his possession. Inside, he found a hidden diary in which was recorded “By the time you hear this, I guess I will be already dead….”

name: Rebirth of the Majestic Wife
author: Distribution Culture
content: The heroine Elaine stood alongside her boyfriend Ethan Xia, helping him fight in the business industry for many years. However, her efforts went through the drain when it was repaid by a car accident instigated by Ethan Xia. Dying full of resentment, she was unexpectedly reborn into the body of Miss Coretta Su. Determined to seek revenge, she uses the body of Correta Su to marry Leo Pei, the ML and opens a path toward revenge.

name: The Ultimate Middle-Aged Hunter Travels to Another World ~This Time, He Wants to Live a Slow and Pea
author: Unknown

name: How to be God
author: Lin Jie The 4th
kind: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Fantasy - Martial Arts - Shounen
content: Yang Jian is exiled into the human realm from the Heavens in order to repent. His former partner, The Howling Celestial Hound, has reincarnated into a loli. Witness how a barbaric Immortal from the Heavens and a loli move 100 demons to tears.

name: Souboutei Kowasubeshi
author: FUJITA Kazuhiro
content: A mysterious mansion has towered proudly over the Tokyo district of Numanakarai since the Taisho period. Those who enter either never escape, or leave having experienced horrors untold, and with the desire to take revenge.

name: Hoankan Evans No Uso ~ Dead Or Love~
author: KURIYAMA Mizuki
content: Updating

name: Zettai Karen Children
author: SHIINA Takashi
kind: Action - Comedy - Drama - Romance - Sci-fi - Shounen - Supernatural
content: Its the 21st century, and the number of ESPers continues to increase. They are active in the military, diplomacy, politics, and in other places. They hold the key for global competition. A country that controls ESP can control the world! However individuals who posses higher than Level 4 are less than 3% of the population. There are only three Level 7 people who have government contracts. These three are Kaoru, Aoi, and Shiho, ten-year old girls, who work for B.A.B.E.L. With the guidance of Kouichi, a twenty-year old genius, they catch criminals and evil ESPers.

name: Douluo Dalu 3: The Legend of the Dragon King
author: Tang Jia San Shao
kind: Action - Adventure - Fantasy - Manhua - Martial Arts - Shounen - Supernatural
content:
Following the advancement of spirit technology, the humans of Douluo Continent conquered the ocean and discovered two new continents. After being hunted by spirit masters excessively, the spirit beasts are nearly extinct. After countless years of lying dormant, the King of the Spirit Beasts has awakened in the Great Star Dou Forest. It will lead its remaining clansmen in taking vengeance against humanity! Tang Wu Lin is determined to become a powerful Spirit Master. However, when he awakened his martial spirit, it was actually an… Incomparable talent. The battle of the Dragon King. The Legend of our Dragon King hereby begins..

You may also like:
+ Douluo Dalu
+ Douluo Dalu II
+ Wu Dong Qian Kun

name: Master of Legendary Realms
author: TaXue Comic
content: The previous master of the Sprem Sect passed on his power to Ives before he ascended and became immortal. In order to rectify the Sect and rise up the top one as they were, Ives secretly changed his identify to be the son of the House Windsor, a powerful royal family of Shang dynasty...

name: Heart Gear
author: Tsuyoshi Takaki
kind: Action - Adventure - Mecha - Mystery - Shounen - Slice of Life
content:
HEART GEAR manga summary: 
In a ruined world, a human girl, Lu, and a droid, Zet, live a humble life. Then one day, they encounter a mysterious new droid, Chrome... Now all three of them live together like a family, but then...

name: Soul Land III - The Legend of the Dragon King
author: Mu feng chun
content: Following the advancement of spirit technology, the humans of Douluo Continent conquered the ocean and discovered two new continents. After being hunted by spirit masters excessively, the spirit beasts are nearly extinct. After countless years of lying dormant, the King of the Spirit Beasts has awakened in the Great Star Dou Forest. It will lead its remaining clansmen in taking vengeance against humanity! Tang Wu Lin is determined to become a powerful Spirit Master. However, when he awakened his martial spirit, it was actually an… Incomparable talent. The battle of the Dragon King. The Legend of our Dragon King hereby begins.

name: Senyuu. - Main Quest Part 2
author: Haruhara robinson
content: Note: This is a direct sequel of [url=https://mangadex.org/title/10084/senyuu-main-quest-part-1]Senyuu Main Quest Part 1[/url], which should be read before starting Part 2.    Hero Lyman and Royal Soldier Toryuu, sent off by the King to subjugate the Demon Lord. The two of them are facing off against rampaging demonic beasts to protect some children. But just when they thought all hope was lost... he appears! Who's grown stronger than anyone could've ever believed! What kind of battle will he show us?    Rib Ma- whoops, that is, Hero Alba's new adventure starts now!     (This is a manga remake of Season 2 of the webtoon "Senyuu." Most of the plot remains the same, but with some additional scenes added and minor changes to dialogue.)

name: 100-nin No Eiyuu O Sodateta Saikyou Yogensha Wa, Boukensha Ni Natte Mo Sekaijuu No Deshi Kara Shitaw
author: Updating
content: Updating

name: Live Dungeon
author: dy Reitou
content: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.

name: Hoankan Evans no Uso
author: Kuriyama Miduki
content: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.

name: The Population Of The Frontier Owner Starts With 0. "Dias The Blue" And A Blue Horned Girl.
author: Kinta
kind: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Drama - Fantasy - Romance - Seinen - Slice of Life
content: Dias fulfilled his parents' will to help others, and kept fighting on the battlefield to that end. Now known as the “Savior Hero” from his long wartime career, he was rewarded with a vast territory from the king. After having met the horned Kijin girl Aruna who lives there, he begins his new slow life as a lord.

name: Ragna Crimson
author: Kobayashi Daiki
kind: Action - Adventure - Drama - Fantasy - Shounen - Supernatural - Tragedy
content: Ragna Crimson summary is updating. Come visit MangaNelo.com sometime to read the latest chapter of Ragna Crimson. If you have any question about this manga, Please don't hesitate to contact us or translate team. Hope you enjoy it.

name: Douluo Dalu II - Jueshi Tangmen
author: Tang jia san shao
kind: Action - Adventure - Fantasy - Romance - School Life - Shounen
content: A land without magic, dou-qi or martial arts, but having essence spirits. This is the combat continent 10 000 years after the formation of Tang Sect. A new hero and his friends walk the land. There are new “Seven Monsters of Shrek“. Will the Tang Sect be able to struggle through? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?

name: Isekai wo Seigyo Mahou de Kirihirake!
author: Satake Akinori
kind: Action - Adventure - Drama - Fantasy - Romance - Shounen
content: Evan Douglas despite being born in nobility, he was bullied by everyone in his family due to his low mana capacity and even more due to his black hair and eyes that does not run in the family. The only person who is kind to him is his maid Serafina from the wolf beastman race that is of similar age and he is later exiled from the family and Serafina follows him. But either by luck or fate, after suffering a hit in the head, Evan started having dreams of a place with extremely high-technology beyond anything he could imagine, in it he saw dolls being controlled by some strange magic and glowing windows with moving pictures. These dreams lead him to develop a new magic he calls control magic, that does not belong to any of the known elements. Now Evan with his new abilities goes adventuring with his maid Serafina.
